data.persona: We are the benevolent Founders of GloopdeGloo. Confident in our success, we need no outside advice, but we really can't do anything at all for ourselves. We require many acolytes to do our bidding, insufferable incompetents that we are!
data.description:
You are in the Beside church pews.
The church pews fill the church as far as the eye can see. They are made of wood, harvested from ancient trees long ago. They gleam with the look of tender love and care, since they are polished after each ceremony.
There's a pew, a wood, a carvings, a candle, a handle, and an altar here.
The follower and the congregant are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shoes.

data.mid_motivation: I need to make myself feel better after the congregant insulted me by calling me an "insufferable incompetent" (even if it is true).
data.long_motivation: I must assert my dominance as the founder of GloopdeGloo so that others will not only respect our success, but also give us the individual respect that we deserve.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: use candle with congregant, smacking them over the head

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: go carvings along church walls to admire the artistry
